CharacterCreator.StatMessage: To get updated stat weights use WowAnalyzer.com with a recent log and enter the values here from the 'Statistics' tab.CH

UserInputs._Comments1: Translations for the User Input Components

HealerCards._Comments1: Translations for the Accordian for Healer Info

HallOfFame.title: Welcome to the Hall of FameCH
HallOfFame.introduction: Insert Blurb Here about thanking patronsCH.

InsertLog.InsertLogHeader: Paste Your Warcraft Logs Report HereCH

MainMenu.PatronInvite: Love the app? Support the site on Patreon!CH
MainMenu.PatronThanks: Thank you so much for your support!CH
MainMenu.CharHelpText: Add your characters here. Right click to edit your stat weights, realm information and more.CH

Tooltips.LegendaryAnalysis: Find your best legendary power and where to get itCH
Tooltips.CooldownPlanner: Plan your cooldowns. Create your own or analyse logsCH

Tooltip.InsertLog: Insert a log to increase accuracyCH.
Tooltip.SimC: Insert a SimC string to import your gearCH.

QeProfile.EmailMsg: Enter/Update your Email to link to PatreonCH

QuickCompare.Title: Quick CompareCH
QuickCompare.HelpText: Quick Compare allows you to compare items one by one. You can add items manually using the dropdowns above, or all at once using a string from the SimC addon. The score is automatically shown in the top right corner in yellow, and items are ordered by strength.CH
QuickCompare.ItemErrorMsg: Item Not Added. Ilvl Cap is 300CH

Soulbinds.ConduitInstructions: Right/Left Click Conduits to change IlvlCH

Settings.Setting0Tooltip: The equip effect of 'Cabalist's Hymnal' is increased by 5% per AllyCH

TopGear.Title: 者名
TopGear.HelpText: Top Gear allows you to generate an entire gear set at once. Start by entering your SimC string above, then click to highlight any items you want included in the comparison. When you're all set, hit 'Go' at the bottom of the page. To enter items manually, return to the main menu and include them in QE Quick Compare. Great Vault items are added automatically though for the first week consider your choice carefully outside of the app.CH
TopGear.ItemsHereMessage: Your items will go here after you import.CH

UpgradeFinderFront.RaidDifficultyBody: Select up to two difficulties to find upgrades from
UpgradeFinderFront.MythicPlusBody: Use the Slider to Select the level of keys you usually complete
UpgradeFinderFront.HelpText: Insert a SimC String, Select up to two raid difficulties, your standard mythic keystone level, and your PVP rating to see where you can find your next upgrade!

Vision of Unending Growth.name: 无尽春天的愿景
Vision of Unending Growth.desc: 回春术有2.5%的几率在一个附近目标身上生成一个新的回春术。

The Dark Titans Lesson.name: 黑暗泰坦之训
The Dark Titans Lesson.desc: 你的生命绽放可以同时在两个目标身上生效，但生命绽放的治疗效果降低10%。

Verdant Infusion.name: 翡翠灌注
Verdant Infusion.desc: 迅捷治愈不再消耗一个持续治疗效果，并使你在目标身上的持续治疗效果的持续时间延长8秒。

Lycaras Fleeting Glimpse.name: 莱卡拉的惊鸿一瞥
Lycaras Fleeting Glimpse.desc: 在战斗中，每45秒基于你的形态施放一个法术：野性成长, 原始之怒, 树皮术, 星辰坠落, 狂奔怒吼

Memory of the Mother Tree.name: 母亲之树的回忆
Memory of the Mother Tree.desc: 野性成长有40%几率使你的下一个回春术或愈合能够施加给目标20码范围内额外3名盟友。

Oath of the Elder Druid.name: 德鲁伊长者之誓
Oath of the Elder Druid.desc: 厚皮、星界支配、豹之迅捷和伊瑟拉之赐的效果提高75%。 当你变形成亲和的形态时，你每1 min会获得一次持续10秒的野性之心效果。
Oath of the Elder Druid.droploc: 用荣誉点数从承销商佐·库尔处购买。

Circle of Life and Death.name: 生死循环
Circle of Life and Death.desc: 你的持续伤害效果造成全部伤害所需时间减少25%，你的持续治疗效果造成全部治疗所需时间减少15%。

Of Dusk and Dawn.name: 黄昏与黎明
Of Dusk and Dawn.desc: 当你拥有5层神圣能量时，你将获得黎明祝福。 当你拥有0层神圣能量时，你将获得黄昏祝福。 黎明祝福: 伤害和治疗效果提高6%，持续8 sec。 黄昏祝福: 受到的伤害降低3%，持续8 sec。

Vanguards Momentum.name: 先锋之势
Vanguards Momentum.desc: 愤怒之锤额外拥有1层充能，并使你造成的神圣伤害提高3%，持续8 sec，可以叠加3层。

The Magistrates Judgment.name: 法官的审判
The Magistrates Judgment.desc: 审判有75%的几率使你下一个消耗神圣能量的技能的消耗减少1点。

Inflorescence of the Sunwell.name: 太阳井之花
Inflorescence of the Sunwell.desc: 圣光灌注获得1次额外使用次数，且效果提高20%。
Inflorescence of the Sunwell.droploc: 罪魂之塔。灵魂熔炉，难度3+

Maraads Dying Breath.name: 玛尔拉德的临终之息
Maraads Dying Breath.desc: 使用黎明之光治疗之后，你的下一次殉道者之光还会同时治疗你的圣光道标的目标。黎明之光每治疗一个盟友，就会使殉道者之光的治疗量提高10%。

Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun.name: 破影者，日之破晓
Shadowbreaker, Dawn of the Sun.desc: 黎明之光的射程提高到40码。黎明之光中所有盟友从你的精通：光明使者中受到的加成将与在10码时受到的加成相同，持续6 sec。 荣耀圣言从你的精通中受到的加成提高50%。

Shock Barrier.name: 震击屏障
Shock Barrier.desc: 神圣震击使用圣光护盾保护目标，持续18 sec，每6秒最多可吸收神圣震击治疗量20%的伤害。只能保护5个目标。
Shock Barrier.droploc: 罪魂之塔。凇心间隙，难度3+

The Mad Paragon.name: 疯狂圣贤
The Mad Paragon.desc: 愤怒之锤造成的伤害提高30%，并会使复仇之怒的持续时间延长1秒。

Relentless Inquisitor.name: 无情审讯
Relentless Inquisitor.desc: 使用终结技时每消耗一点神圣能量，就会使你的急速提高1%，持续12 sec，最多可叠加5次。

Clarity of Mind.name: 坚定意志
Clarity of Mind.desc: 全神贯注期间，真言术：盾消耗的法力值降低20%，施加的救赎效果延长6秒。

Crystalline Reflection.name: 晶化反射
Crystalline Reflection.desc: 真言术：盾立即为目标恢复(42% of Spell power)点生命值，并反射吸收伤害的20%。

Kiss of Death.name: 死神之吻
Kiss of Death.desc: 使暗言术：灭的冷却时间缩短8秒，且暗言术：灭对生命值低于20%的目标造成伤害时可以触发救赎。

The Penitent One.name: 悔罪者
The Penitent One.desc: 真言术：耀有60%的几率使你下一次苦修不消耗法力值，且额外发射3支圣光之矢。

Cauterizing Shadows.name: 烧灼暗影
Cauterizing Shadows.desc: 当暗言术：痛在一名目标身上消失时，该目标30码范围内的3名盟友将恢复(55% of Spell power)点生命值。

Measured Contemplation.name: 审慎沉思
Measured Contemplation.desc: 当你不施放暗影愈合时，会使你的下一次暗影愈合的效果提高50%。该效果每15秒生效一次，最多叠加4次。

Twins of the Sun Priestess.name: 双子太阳女祭司
Twins of the Sun Priestess.desc: 对盟友使用能量灌注时，也会使你获得其100%的效果。

Divine Image.name: 神圣镜像
Divine Image.desc: 当你使用圣言法术时，有几率在你身边召唤一个纳鲁镜像。在15 sec内，你每施放一个法术，纳鲁也将施放一个类似的法术。

Flash Concentration.name: 快速专注
Flash Concentration.desc: 每当你施放快速治疗时，治疗术的施法时间缩短0.2秒，治疗效果提高3%，该效果最多可叠加5次。

Harmonious Apparatus.name: 谐律装置
Harmonious Apparatus.desc: 治疗之环会使圣言术：灵的冷却时间缩短，愈合祷言会使圣言术：静的冷却时间缩短，神圣之火会使圣言术：罚的冷却时间缩短，缩短的数值均为4秒。

X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus.name: 萨什，大主教本尼迪塔斯的归来
X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus.desc: 在救赎之魂消失后，你将会复活，恢复最多100%的生命值，恢复的生命值由你在救赎之魂下产生的有效治疗决定。每10 min只能触发一次。

Vault of Heavens.name: 天堂之跃
Vault of Heavens.desc: 信仰飞跃现在会使你向目标跳去，并且可以使用2次。
Vault of Heavens.droploc: 用荣誉点数从承销商佐·库尔处购买。

Earthen Harmony.name: 大地祥和
Earthen Harmony.desc: 治疗波可以添加一层大地之盾效果，至多9层最大层数。如果你的大地之盾的目标低于75%生命值，大地之盾的治疗效果提高150%。

Jonat's Natural Focus.name: 约纳特的自然专注
Jonat's Natural Focus.desc: 施放治疗波或治疗之涌后，你下一个治疗链的治疗效果提高10%，最多叠加5次。

Primal Tide Core.name: 始源之潮核心
Primal Tide Core.desc: 每施放4次激流，你的激流就会施加给初始激流目标附近的另一个友方目标。

Ancestral Reminder.name: 先祖之忆
Ancestral Reminder.desc: 嗜血以及其他相似效果在你身上的持续时间延长20.0秒，嗜血以及其他相似效果还会使你额外获得10%的急速。

Chains of Devastation.name: 毁灭之链
Chains of Devastation.desc: 施放治疗链会使你的下一个闪电链变为瞬发[，并且造成的伤害提高50%]。施放闪电链会使你的下一个治疗链变为瞬发[，且不消耗法力值]。
Chains of Devastation.droploc: 用荣誉点数从承销商佐·库尔处购买。

Deeply Rooted Elements.name: 根深蒂固的元素
Deeply Rooted Elements.desc: 施放 风暴打击有8%的几率激活升腾，持续6.0秒。

Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem.name: 灵魂行者的潮汐图腾
Spiritwalker's Tidal Totem.desc: 使用法力之潮图腾后，治疗波和治疗链的施法时间缩短50%，法力值消耗减少25%，持续10 sec。

Escape from Reality.name: Escape from Reality
Escape from Reality.desc: After you use Transcendence: Transfer, you can use Transcendence: Transfer again within 10 sec, ignoring its cooldown. During this time, if you cast Vivify on yourself, its healing is increased by 70% and 50% of its cost is refunded.

Invoker's Delight.name: Invoker's Delight
Invoker's Delight.desc: You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.

Roll Out.name: Roll Out
Roll Out.desc: During (Chi Torpedo / Roll), you are immune to roots and snares.

Fatal Touch.name: Fatal Touch
Fatal Touch.desc: Touch of Death cooldown reduced by 120 sec.

Ancient Teachings of the Monastery.name: Ancient Teachings of the Monastery
Ancient Teachings of the Monastery.desc: After casting Essence Font, your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, and Rising Sun Kick heal an injured ally within 20 yards for 250% of the damage done. Lasts 15 sec.

Yu'lon's Whisper.name: Yu'lon's Whisper
Yu'lon's Whisper.desc: Activating Thunder Focus Tea causes you to exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 6 allies within 15 yards over 2 sec.

Clouded Focus.name: Clouded Focus
Clouded Focus.desc: Healing with Enveloping Mists or Vivify while channeling Soothing Mists increases their healing done by 15% and reduces their mana cost by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times. When your Soothing Mists channel ends, this effect is cancelled.

Tear of Morning.name: Tear of Morning
Tear of Morning.desc: Casting Vivify or Enveloping Mist on a target with Renewing Mist has a 10% chance to spread the Renewing Mist to another target. Your Vivify healing through Renewing Mist is increased by 20% and your Enveloping Mist also heals allies with Renewing Mist for 20% of its healing.

Vitality Sacrifice.name: Vitality Sacrifice
Vitality Sacrifice.desc: Taking significant damage from a player or Elite enemy increases your damage and healing by 3% of the damage taken, up to a maximum of 9% for 20 sec. This effect can only occur every 30 sec.

Sephuz's Proclamation.name: Sephuz's Proclamation
Sephuz's Proclamation.desc: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Echo of Eonar.name: Echo of Eonar
Echo of Eonar.desc: Your spells and abilities have a low chance to summon a familiar to your side, increasing your healing by 10% for 10s. This effect is duplicated on up to 3 allies at 50% effectiveness, preferring allies with the same role.
